arts.ttl: Post Match Reaction: Dortmund unconvincing, but Battle past St. Pauli 2-1
arts.sum: In theory, the home games against the two newly promoted teams should be the easiest of the season to win, but still Dortmund struggled to get the job done. If there’s one thing I’ve gotten used to in recent seasons, it’s Borussia Dortmund struggling against recently-promoted teams.

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Borussia Dortmund Deserved 2-1 Winners Against St. Pauli
arts.sum: BVB took the lead just before half-time when Ramy Bensebaini did an excellent job converting a Pascal Groß cross, but it looked like Dortmund might drop points, despite a relatively dominant (if not necessarily good ) performance, after an absolute belter of a shot from St. Pauli’s Eric Smith levelled things in the 78th minute. They left it late but ended with a 2-1 win over St. Pauli tonight after Serhou Guirassy headed home the winning goal in the 83rd minute.

arts.ttl: Guirassy's late goal earns Dortmund a Bundesliga win before Real Madrid test in Champions League
arts.sum: Serhou Guirassy scored late as Borussia Dortmund beat promoted St. Pauli 2-1 in the Bundesliga on Friday, easing some pressure on the club before facing Real Madrid. Dortmund next visits Madrid in the Champions League on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Serhou Guirassy hits late winner as Borussia Dortmund edge St. Pauli
arts.sum: In the 43rd minute, Pascal Groß delivered a pinpoint cross into the box, finding Ramy Bensebaini who rose highest to head the ball into the far corner. In the 64th minute, a flurry of chances fell to the home side, with Guirassy forcing another save from Vasilj and Malen narrowly missing the target.

arts.ttl: Match Reaction | Who are Borussia Dortmund?
arts.sum: On Friday evening, Borussia Dortmund overcame a stubborn St. Pauli side 2-1 to continue their 100% record at the Westfalenstadion this season. In a first half that saw BvB fail…

arts.ttl: Late Guirassy strike ensures Dortmund secure fully deserved three points
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund have secured their fourth win of the 2024/25 Bundesliga campaign and temporarily pulled into the top-four with a 2-1 win over visiting St. Pauli. A late winner from striker Serhou Guirassy helped Nuri Sahin's BVB overcome a St. Pauli equalizer that threatened to negate their dominant performance.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund 2-1 St. Pauli: Player ratings as Serhou Guirassy secures late win
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund beat newly-promoted St. Pauli to keep their 100 percent record at home intact with their fourth successive Bundesliga win of the season. After Eric Smith’s equaliser, Serhou Guirassy…

arts.ttl: Liverpool sent firm transfer warning amid Karim Adeyemi, Omar Marmoush, Alvaro Fernandez links
arts.sum: Liverpool expert David Lynch comments on the Reds' prospects of pulling off transfer deals for Karim Adeyemi, Omar Marmoush and Alvaro Fernandez in 2025.

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: Borussia Dortmund vs. FC St. Pauli
arts.sum: The Bundesliga returns with the 2024/25 match-day seven Friday night curtain raiser! Team sheets for the duel between tradition-rich clubs Borussia Dortmund and FC St. Pauli have been released.

arts.ttl: Bundesliga Match Thread: Borussia Dortmund Host St. Pauli
arts.sum: Use those and don’t share any illegal streams in the comments. Streaming: ESPN+ (USA), Sky Go (UK)
